Sunghwan Hong

Ph.D. Student at the Korea University

sung_hwan@korea.ac.kr

About
I am a Ph.D. Student under the supervision of Prof. Seungryong Kim since 2021. Before joining CVLAB in Korea University, I obtained a barchelor’s degree in Computer Science and Engineering at Korea University. My primary research interest is Computer Vision, especially visual correspondence and its applications.
